author: Valentina Muzi
title: â€œHo sempre voluto lavorare con Disneyâ€. Le rivelazioni nella nuova biografia di Keith Haring
text:
â€œHo sempre voluto lavorare con Disneyâ€. Le rivelazioni nella nuova biografia di Keith Haring
Dopo averlo tanto desiderato, il writer statunitense ricevette una proposta di collaborazione da parte della Disney. Peccato che la lettera arrivÃ² solo nel 1990, poco prima della sua morte
Nato il 4 maggio 1958 a Reading, in Pennsylvania,
Keith Haring ha subito rivelato una forte inclinazione per il disegno. Una propensione incoraggiata dal padre e influenzata dai personaggi di fumetti americani e cartoni, soprattutto quelli della Disney. â€œHo sempre voluto lavorare per Walt Disney quando stavo crescendoâ€, raccontava il giovane writer statunitense. â€œIn qualche modo penso sia uno dei tre artisti piÃ¹ importanti del XX secolo insieme a Warhol e Picassoâ€œ. Un ascendente che ha forgiato alcune delle opere piÃ¹ note di Haring, come i disegni di Mickey Mouse realizzati nel 1980 traendo ispirazione dalla Pop Art e dai graffiti. Nel corso della sua carriera, Haring ha provato diverse volte a entrare in collaborazione con la casa di produzione americana, ma senza successo. La svolta arriva nel 1990, quando la Disney invia una proposta di collaborazione allâ€™artista. A rivelarlo Ã¨ Brad Gooch, autore di Radiant: The Life and Line of Keith Haring, la nuova biografia di Keith Haring, in uscita a marzo.
La proposta di collaborazione di Walt Disney per Keith Haring
Dellâ€™arrivo di una lettera da parte della Disney ne aveva giÃ  parlato la critica Ingrid Sischy nel 1997 (come si legge su Artnew.com), ma il suo contenuto non era ancora stato approfondito.
Oggi, Googh rivela i dettagli della proposta di collaborazione in Radiant: The Life and Line of Keith Haring, sottolineando che lâ€™artista veniva sollecitato per il progetto Mickey Mouse visto attraverso gli occhi di Keith Haring. Purtroppo, la lettera arrivÃ² solo nel 1990, poco prima della morte dellâ€™artista. Questi era a conoscenza del sollecito da parte della casa di produzione ma, oscillando tra momenti di luciditÃ  e altri di smarrimento, Haring pensÃ² che fosse una bugia nel tentavo di alleviare parte del suo dolore. In ogni caso, lâ€™artista non avrebbe avuto le facoltÃ  per potersi dedicare a un lavoro del genere.
La collaborazione tra la Disney e Keith Haring
Possiamo dire che il sogno dellâ€™artista Ã¨ diventato realtÃ  postumo, nel 2021, quando la Keith Haring Foundation e la Disney hanno iniziato a produrre orologi Swatch, magliette Uniqlo e borse Coach utilizzando le opere dâ€™arte originali Disney Mickey Mouse di Keith Haring. â€œIl rispetto e lâ€™ammirazione di Keith Haring per Walt Disney, in particolare per lâ€™amato Topolino, sono serviti come ispirazione per alcuni dei suoi pezzi iconiciâ€, precisano dalla Fondazione. â€œCollaborando con Disney, siamo in grado di dare vita alle sue opere dâ€™arte attraverso un nuovo mezzo e continuare a celebrare la sua influenza duratura sulla comunitÃ  artistica e sulle generazioni futureâ€.
Valentina Muzi
Artribune Ã¨ anche su Whatsapp. Ãˆ sufficiente

author: Michael Copley
title: A warm, dry spring has U.S. forecasters worried about the upcoming wildfire season
text: A warm, dry spring has U.S. forecasters worried about the upcoming wildfire season Most of the United States is expected to see warmer-than-average temperatures this spring, federal forecasters say, with dry conditions likely in the West. That's raising concerns about wildfires, especially in parts of the Southwest, Great Plains, and the Upper Mississippi River Valley, said Jon Gottschalck, operations branch chief at the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration's Climate Prediction Center. The southern High Plains, in particular, which includes Colorado, Kansas, New Mexico, Oklahoma, and Texas, is going to be "quite vulnerable to high wildfire risk, especially during high wind events," Gottschalck said Thursday on a call with reporters. Texas recently suffered the largest wildfire in the state's history, which investigators [say was started by power lines](https://www.nytimes.com/2024/03/07/us/texas-smokehouse-creek-fire-xcel-energy.html). In the Mid-Atlantic this week, high winds [helped fuel blazes](https://www.nytimes.com/2024/03/21/us/virginia-wv-wildfires.html) in North Carolina, Virginia, West Virginia, and Maryland. NOAA [released its Spring Outlook](https://www.noaa.gov/news-release/spring-outlook-warmer-for-most-of-us-wetter-in-southeast) amid a stretch of record warm weather. Last month was the [hottest February on record](https://www.noaa.gov/news/earth-just-had-its-warmest-february-on-record), and 2023 was the [hottest year ever](https://www.npr.org/2023/12/28/1221827923/2023-hottest-year-record-climate-change). High average temperatures last year were exacerbated by a strong El NiÃ±o climate pattern, which is a [natural cycle](https://www.npr.org/2023/07/05/1186098964/with-el-nino-and-climate-change-this-week-saw-some-of-the-hottest-recorded-weath) that heats water in the Pacific Ocean and raises average temperatures worldwide. Gottschalck said the effects of the current El NiÃ±o are expected to weaken through the spring. But recent heat records are part of a longer warming trend that scientists expect to continue as climate change intensifies. Global temperatures are rising because of the accumulation of greenhouse gasses like carbon dioxide in the atmosphere, [according to the World Meteorological Organization](https://wmo.int/news/media-centre/climate-change-indicators-reached-record-levels-2023-wmo#:~:text=The%20WMO%20report%20confirmed%20that,ten%2Dyear%20period%20on%20record.), which is part of the United Nations. Those greenhouse gasses come from humans burning fossil fuels. "Climate change is affecting the timing, intensity, and duration of weather events in the United States," Rick Spinrad, NOAA's administrator, said in a news release. Forecasters also warned of low water levels on the Mississippi River this summer because of below-average snowpack and precipitation in the Northern Plains and the Midwest. Ed Clark, director of the National Water Center, said low-flow conditions could affect navigation on the entire Mississippi River system, as well as water supplies for communities and industries. NOAA doesn't expect major flooding anywhere in the country this spring. Copyright 2024 NPR. To see more, visit https://www.npr.org.

author: JD Franklin III
title: Pilot Mountain Town Manager Michael Boaz placed on administrative leave
text:
Pilot Mountain Town Manager placed on administrative leave after â€˜discrepanciesâ€™ discovered in townâ€™s finances, mayor says
The town manager of Pilot Mountain, Michael Boaz, has been placed on administrative leave after questions arose concerning the townâ€™s finances, according to Mayor Evan J. Cockerham.
Cockerham said that he, along with Mayor Pro-Tem Donna Kiger, â€œdiscovered discrepancies in the townâ€™s finances.â€™ He said this led to the Board of Commissioner and Pilot Mountainâ€™s legal teams directing him to place Boaz on administrative leave.
TOP STORIES
1 airlifted after Asheboro chase ends in crash; Firearms, fake cash found in car, officials sayNorth Carolina hit record-breaking early voting numbersMan found dead from gunshot wound to the head, High Point officials say
Get the latest news stories of interest by clicking here
This will give the town the time to investigate â€œwithout interference.â€
In the meantime, assistant Town Manager Holly Utt was appointed to acting town manager.
Adam McHone, President of the Board of Directors of Pilot Mountain Rescue and EMS said, â€œOnce it became clear that State grant funds, earmarked for improvement to the Rescue Squad building had been misused, Mayor Cockherham immediately took swift, decisive action.â€
You can read both statements from Cockerham and McHone below.
Watch: NOWCAST streaming newscasts
Cockerham's statement reads:
Last year, standing in front of town hall, I promised accountability. That applies not just to our Police Department which has made great strides toward delivering a higher level of service to our community and building trust through Chief Tillotsonâ€™s leadership, but throughout all departments.
On Monday morning, after Mayor Pro-Tem Donna Kiger and I discovered discrepancies in the townâ€™s finances, the Board of Commissioners, in conjunction with the townâ€™s legal team, directed me to place Town Manager Michael Boaz on administrative leave. This leave gives the town an opportunity to investigate this matter without interference, in coordination with the Local Government Commission and any other authorities as maybe required. We will consider additional personnel action when appropriate.
Assistant Town Manager, Holly Utt has been designated as acting town manager. Thank you for your trust. Our board of commissioners is committed to making sure that all aspects of our local government remain up to the standards that the citizens of this great town deserve.
Keep up with the latest news and weather by downloading the WXII app here
McHone's statement reads:
As an emergency volunteer community agency profoundly impacted by this unfortunate situation, Pilot Mountain Rescue and EMS, Inc. is fully committed to supporting the ongoing investigation to ensure transparency and achieve a fair and timely resolution.
I reported my concerns to Mayor Cockerham. Once it became clear that State grant funds earmarked for improvements to the Rescue Squad building had been misused, Mayor Cockerham immediately took swift, decisive action. He has been understanding, courageous and completely transparent. Mayor Cockerham and the Board of Commissioners, particularly commissioner Donna Kiger, have been very supportive of the Rescue Squad and other parties impacted by these events.
As a dedicated part of this community, we are hopeful that these joint efforts will clarify the circumstances. Despite being adversely affected, Pilot Mountain Rescue and EMS, Inc. remains steadfast in our mission and is optimistic that it will strengthen our relationship with the Town. I also want to assure our many friends and supporters that the financial discrepancies at Town Hall are no reflection of the books and records of the Rescue Squad. Our financial position remains verifiably strong, untainted by what was allegedly done by the Town Manager.

author: Diya Lal
title: Alibaba chief affirms faith in China's AI, consumer market
text:
Alibaba Group Holding has reiterated its commitment to Chinaâ€™s AI and consumer markets, according to chief financial officer Toby Xu Hong in an interview with Xinhua.
Alibaba is a China-based technology company operating in e-commerce, cloud computing, and digital infrastructure.
Xu said the company has allocated 380 billion yuan (US$52 billion) for AI-related infrastructure and an additional 50 billion yuan (US$6.97 billion) for subsidies benefiting merchants and consumers.
These investments are aimed at supporting technology and internet service development in China.
Xu cited encouragement from a February business symposium attended by President Xi Jinping and leading entrepreneurs, which influenced Alibabaâ€™s recent strategic decisions.
In February, Alibaba announced plans to spend at least 380 billion yuan (US$53 billion) over three years on AI, cloud computing, and related infrastructure, surpassing its total spending in these sectors over the past decade.
ðŸ”— Source: South China Morning Post
ðŸ§  Food for thought 1ï¸âƒ£ Alibabaâ€™s investment reflects Chinaâ€™s rapidly expanding AI market dynamics Alibabaâ€™s $52 billion AI commitment comes as Chinaâ€™s AI sector reaches unprecedented scale, with over 5,100 AI companies representing 15% of the global total and 71 recognized unicorns 1 .
The Chinese AI market was valued at 747 billion yuan ($103 billion) in 2024 and is projected to exceed 1 trillion yuan by 2025, indicating the massive opportunity driving Alibabaâ€™s substantial investment 1 .
This isnâ€™t Alibabaâ€™s first major AI bet. The company previously led a $600 million funding round for facial recognition startup SenseTime in 2019, when it became the worldâ€™s most valuable private AI startup 2 .
Alibaba also developed its own Hanguang 800 AI inference chip in 2019, which improved machine learning tasks by 12 times and reduced the time to categorize 1 billion product images from one hour to just five minutes 3 .
The scale of current investment reflects intensifying competition, as rivals like Baidu have achieved significant milestones with their ERNIE Bot gaining over 200 million users and handling 1.65 billion daily API calls by late 2024 4 .
2ï¸âƒ£ Investment timing capitalizes on renewed government support for private sector participation The announcement follows Chinaâ€™s Private Economy Promotion Law, which aims to support private enterprises that contribute over 60% of GDP and 80% of urban jobs 5 .
Alibaba CFO Toby Xu linked the investment decision to President Xi Jinpingâ€™s February business symposium with entrepreneurs, indicating how policy signals directly influence private sector capital allocation.
Chinaâ€™s public sector AI spending alone is expected to exceed 400 billion yuan in 2025, while total AI investments reached approximately $209 billion from 2013 to 2023, demonstrating the governmentâ€™s commitment to the sector 1 .
The AI sector is projected to add 0.2 to 0.3 percentage points to Chinaâ€™s annual GDP growth, equivalent to $930 billion in labor value by 2025, making private sector participation strategically important for national economic goals 1 .
